thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to get a summary of a long text from a website.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting a summary of a long text can save time and help me quickly understand the main points of the text. It can also be a good way to practice my natural language processing skills.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the get_text_summary command to get a summary of a long text from a website.
- Specify the URL of the website and the question to be answered.
- Store the summary in a file for future reference.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to violate any website's terms of service or use the summary in an unethical way.
thoughts.speak: I would like to use the get_text_summary command to get a summary of a long text from a website. I will be careful not to violate any website's terms of service or use the summary in an unethical way.
